name: Postboy
description:
The Postal Service is a vitally important asset of every society. But growing up a Postboy in training, you may have to learn things the hard way... like how to save your dad from a skeleton dragon, for example. Perhaps there's more to the life of a Post Officer than meets the eye.

Postboy is equal parts exploration, puzzle solving, and platforming action, with a dash of RPG elements, all coated with delicious pixel art graphics, and served with a side of SNES-era inspired soundtrack goodness. All prepared by chef Seelocanth for your gaming pleasure.

Windows port by Aidan Lee
